ari.tweet: i'm watching this qb disaster between jets & cardinals hoping they make charlie batch look like tom brady when steelers play ravens later
rex ryan replaced qb mark sanchez with greg mcelroy 3rd q, who passed the lone td of the game to jeff cumberland; #jets beat #cardinals, 7-6
dolphins, patriots, seahawks, cardinals.. we got the dolphins, patriots maybe loss, seahawks we got em, and cardinals we got em!
rt @baxfootballguru: #nfl halftime (week 13): #cardinals 3, #jets 0. teams w/combined 3 pts, qbs ryan lindley (1) & mark sanchez (3) ...
@azcardinals & @nyjets this is the worst #nfl game i have ever watched.
@b_roberts21 so going off your comments your wins against the chiefs panthers raiders cowboys eagles cardinals and saints should not count
rt @nyjets: #rl jets get first sack of ryan lindley today--bart scott, david harris split it. cards came in most sacked team in nfl.
rt @azcardinals: kerry rhodes is feeling it today.  2nd int in the first qtr.  @azcardinals take over on the nyj 48.  #azvsnyj #bigredrage
rt @nyjets: #rl david harris blitz rush forces ryan lindley into 3rd-down incompletion. jets d now has 5 three-and-outs in this game.
